name: Instaread, Inc.
description: Developer of an online book summarization application designed to provide key insights into books in readable and audible formats. The company's application sums up and provides analysis, key takeaways, and insights from bestselling non-fiction books in text and audio format, enabling users to read or listen to and understand the concepts of their favourite books.
one_liner: Developer of an online book summarization application designed to provide key insights into books in readable and audible formats. The company's application sums up and provides analysis, key takeaways, and insights from bestselling non-fiction books in text and audio format, enabling users to read or listen to and understand the concepts of their favourite books.
